subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The Italian brothers Francesco and Edoardo Molinari set up an intriguing finale at the Johnnie Walker Championship in Gleneagles, Scotland, with a Ryder Cup place also at stake for the older of the two.
snippet: The Italian brothers Francesco and Edoardo Molinari set up an intriguing finale at the Johnnie Walker Championship in Gleneagles, Scotland, with a Ryder Cup place also at stake for the older of the two.
